home.one:
1) Select active character
2) Select active weapon
3) Restore character health
4) Update character name

shop.one:
1) Buy Items
2) Sell Items
3) Upgrade Items

pylons central.one:
1) Buy characters(🦘)
2) Buy 💰5000 with 100 pylons
3) Sell 💰 from orderbook / place order to buy 💰
4) Buy 💰 from orderbook / place order to sell 💰
5) Sell 🗡️  from orderbook / place order to buy 🗡️
6) Buy 🗡️  from orderbook / place order to sell 🗡️
7) Sell 🦘 from orderbook / place order to buy 🦘
8) Buy 🦘 from orderbook / place order to sell 🦘

develop.one:
Create cookbook(j)
Switch user(z)
Get initial py)lons
DevMode Test Items(b)

home desc.one:
You are now at home.
If you like to hunt something go to forest.
And if you like to buy/sell something go to shop.

home desc without pylon.one:
You don't have pylon within account.
To buy characters, you need to purchase pylons or sell existing characters/items on market to get pylons.

home desc without character.one:
You don't have any character yet.
You can buy one from market or at the shop

home desc with low HP.one:
Your character's health is very low.
You can restore health by spending loud or just doing rest for few mins.

forest desc.one:
You are now at forest.
You can hunt here or go back to home.

shop desc.one:
You are now at a shop.
If you want you can buy or sell items here.

pylons central desc.one:
You are now at a marketplace.
You can do trading here for coin and items.

develop desc.one: You are now testing things for development. Please enter commands you want to try

select buy character desc.one:
You are gonna buy a character.
Please select a character to buy.

select buy item desc.one:
You are gonna buy an item.
Please select an item to buy.

select sell item desc.one:
You are gonna sell an item.
Please select an item to sell.

rabbits with a sword outcome.one:

Reward 💰sword.attack/2 + 1
